verses.verse: <S%H2088>This<s%> is the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H8435>generations<s%> of <S%H121>Adam.<s%> In the <S%H3117>day<s%> when <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1254>created<s%> <S%H120>man,<s%> He <S%H6213>made<s%> him in the <S%H1823>likeness<s%> of <S%H430>God.<s%>

He <S%H1254>created<s%> them <S%H2145>male<s%> and <S%H5347>female,<s%> and He <S%H1288>blessed<s%> them and <S%H7121>named<s%> <S%H8034><s%> them <S%H120>Man<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> when they were <S%H1254>created.<s%>

When <S%H121>Adam<s%> had <S%H2421>lived<s%> one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> he <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of [a son] in his own <S%H1823>likeness,<s%> according to his <S%H6754>image,<s%> and <S%H7121>named<s%> <S%H8034><s%> him <S%H8352>Seth.<s%>

Then the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H121>Adam<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> he <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H8352>Seth<s%> were <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> and he <S%H3205>had<s%> [other] <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H1323>daughters.<s%>
So <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> that <S%H121>Adam<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> were <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> and he <S%H4191>died.<s%>
And <S%H8352>Seth<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> and <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H583>Enosh.<s%>

Then <S%H8352>Seth<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> he <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H583>Enosh,<s%> and he <S%H3205>had<s%> [other] <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H1323>daughters.<s%>
So <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H8352>Seth<s%> were <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> and he <S%H4191>died.<s%>
And <S%H583>Enosh<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> <S%H8673>ninety<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> and <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H7018>Kenan.<s%>

Then <S%H583>Enosh<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2568>fifteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> he <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H7018>Kenan,<s%> and he <S%H3205>had<s%> [other] <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H1323>daughters.<s%>
So <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H583>Enosh<s%> were <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> and he <S%H4191>died.<s%>
And <S%H7018>Kenan<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> and <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H4111>Mahalalel.<s%>

Then <S%H7018>Kenan<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> he <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H4111>Mahalalel,<s%> and he <S%H3205>had<s%> [other] <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H1323>daughters.<s%>
So <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H7018>Kenan<s%> were <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> and he <S%H4191>died.<s%>
And <S%H4111>Mahalalel<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> sixty-five <S%H8141>years,<s%> and <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H3382>Jared.<s%>

Then <S%H4111>Mahalalel<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> he <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H3382>Jared,<s%> and he <S%H3205>had<s%> [other] <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H1323>daughters.<s%>
So <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H4111>Mahalalel<s%> were <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and ninety-five <S%H8141>years,<s%> and he <S%H4191>died.<s%>
And <S%H3382>Jared<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and sixty-two <S%H8141>years,<s%> and <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H2585>Enoch.<s%>

Then <S%H3382>Jared<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> he <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H2585>Enoch,<s%> and he <S%H3205>had<s%> [other] <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H1323>daughters.<s%>
So <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H3382>Jared<s%> were <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and sixty-two <S%H8141>years,<s%> and he <S%H4191>died.<s%>
And <S%H2585>Enoch<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> sixty-five <S%H8141>years,<s%> and <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H4968>Methuselah.<s%>

Then <S%H2585>Enoch<s%> <S%H1980>walked<s%> with <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> he <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H4968>Methuselah,<s%> and he <S%H3205>had<s%> [other] <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H1323>daughters.<s%>
So <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H2585>Enoch<s%> were <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and sixty-five <S%H8141>years.<s%>
And <S%H2585>Enoch<s%> <S%H1980>walked<s%> with <S%H430>God;<s%> and he was not, for <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> him.
And <S%H4968>Methuselah<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and eighty-seven <S%H8141>years,<s%> and <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H3929>Lamech.<s%>

Then <S%H4968>Methuselah<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and eighty-two <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> he <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H3929>Lamech,<s%> and he <S%H3205>had<s%> [other] <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H1323>daughters.<s%>
So <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H4968>Methuselah<s%> were <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and sixty-nine <S%H8141>years,<s%> and he <S%H4191>died.<s%>
And <S%H3929>Lamech<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and eighty-two <S%H8141>years,<s%> and <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of a <S%H1121>son.<s%>

Now he <S%H7121>called<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H5146>Noah,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H2088>"This<s%> <S%H2088>one<s%> shall <S%H5162>give<s%> us <S%H5162>rest<s%> from our <S%H4639>work<s%> and from the <S%H6093>toil<s%> of our <S%H3027>hands<s%> [arising] from the <S%H127>ground<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H779>cursed.<s%>"

Then <S%H3929>Lamech<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and ninety-five <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> he <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H5146>Noah,<s%> and he <S%H3205>had<s%> [other] <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H1323>daughters.<s%>
So <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H3929>Lamech<s%> were <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and seventy-seven <S%H8141>years,<s%> and he <S%H4191>died.<s%>

And <S%H5146>Noah<s%> was <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old,<s%> and <S%H5146>Noah<s%> <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H8035>Shem,<s%> <S%H2526>Ham,<s%> and <S%H3315>Japheth.<s%>
